title: BINUS Digital Museum
description: An information kiosk about BINUS Digital Museum. It is best viewed at a resolution of 1920x1080 pixels as it will be displayed on a large 55-inch Android TV screen at BINUS Alam Sutera.

title: 3D Annotation System
description: This is one of new features of my Initiative Project (3Digibees) for BINUS. It's a 3D Annotation system using Modelviewer. This is just a prototype, because the real project need you to login using BINUS account to use the features.

title: 3Digibees
description: Website 3D Assets Repository like Sketchfab. Binusian can upload their 3D models, add an annotations and share it using iframe code like Youtube.

title: BINUS Bootstrap
description: A CSS Framework like Twitter Bootstrap used for building apps in BINUS University.
